section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this part, the term:

para.text: “Candidate” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 1-1161.01(6).
“Contribution” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 1-1161.01(10).
“Covered recipient” means:
An elected District official who is or could be involved in influencing or approving the award of a grant;
A candidate for elective District office who is or could be involved in influencing or approving the award of a grant;
A political committee affiliated with a District candidate or elected District official described in subparagraphs (A) and (B) of this paragraph;
A constituent-service program or fund, or substantially similar entity, controlled, operated, or managed by:
An elected District official who is or could be involved in influencing or approving the award of a grant; or
A person under the supervision, direction, or control of an elected District official who is or could be involved in influencing or approving the award of a grant;
A political party; or
An entity or organization:
That a candidate or elected District official described in subparagraphs (A) and (B) of this paragraph, or a member of his or her immediate family, controls; or
In which a candidate or elected District official described in subparagraphs (A) and (B) of this paragraph has an ownership interest of 10% or more.
“Election” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 1-1161.01(15).

“Grant” means financial assistance to a person to support or stimulate the accomplishment of a public purpose as defined by the law that authorizes the grant; provided, that the organization, not the District, defines the specific services, the service levels, and the program approach for carrying out the grant.
“Grant program” means the management or administration by a grantor of grant-making or grant-issuing authority as covered by this part.
“Grantee” means a person that receives funds under a grant program.
“Grantor” means a District agency, board, commission, instrumentality, or program designated by law as the grant-managing entity for a grant program.
“Immediate family” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 1-1161.01(26).
“Person” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 1-1161.01(42).
“Political committee” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 1-1161.01(44).
“Political party” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 1-1161.01(45).
